titleStmt.title: Logomachia: a harmony in discord, shewing the mutual submission of the Episcopal party in the city, and the independent souldiery, to Charles, by the grace of God, King of England, Scotland, France & Ireland, defender of the faith.
titleStmt.author: Rich, Jeremiah, fl. 1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Peter Dring, at the Sun in the Poultry,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Where am I now! upon some unseen wing ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
